condition.command: /execute at @s as @a[nbt={cardinal_components:{"origins:origin":{OriginLayers:[{Origin:"rimuru:rimuru"}]}}}] if score @s rimuru_id = @e[limit=1,sort=nearest,tag=rimuru_predator_victim] rimuru_predator_id

actions.command: execute as @e[type=minecraft:area_effect_cloud,sort=nearest] run data modify entity @s Rotation set from entity @p[sort=nearest,limit=1] Rotation
execute if entity @s[scores={rimuru_spare=1..}] run function rimuru:mercy/add
execute if entity @s[scores={rimuru_death=1..}] run function rimuru:mercy/die

/tellraw @s [{"text":"Do you wish to beg "},{"selector":"@e[tag=rimuru_killer]"},{"text":" for mercy?\n\n"},{"text":"Yes","color":"green","bold":true,"hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","value":"If the player agrees to spare your life, you won't die but, you won't be able to hurt him until your next death and he will be able to kill you at any given time before your next death."},"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/trigger rimuru_spare"}},{"text":"     "},{"text":"No","color":"red","bold":true,"hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","value":"you will die."},"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/trigger rimuru_death"}}]
execute as @e[type=minecraft:area_effect_cloud,sort=nearest] run data modify entity @s Rotation set from entity @p[sort=nearest,limit=1] Rotation

entity_action.command: /tellraw @s [{"text":"All the skills must have a page assigned to them in the Book of Vanitas Settings"}]

actions.command: /tellraw @s {"text":"Wait!! I just looked at your inventory and saw books that don't belong to you! I will be taking all of them back!"}
/execute if score @s[nbt={Inventory:[{id:"minecraft:enchanted_book",tag:{Paralyzing_Breath:1b}}]}] rimuru_fpob matches 0 run clear @s minecraft:enchanted_book{Paralyzing_Breath:1b}

/execute if score @s[nbt={Inventory:[{id:"minecraft:enchanted_book",tag:{Paralyzing_Breath:1b}}]},nbt={cardinal_components:{"apoli:powers":{Powers:[{Type:"rimuru:give_paralyzing_breath"}]}}}] rimuru_fpb matches 1 run clear @s minecraft:enchanted_book{Paralyzing_Breath:1b}
/execute if score @s[nbt={Inventory:[{id:"minecraft:enchanted_book",tag:{Poisonous_Breath:1b}}]}] rimuru_fpob matches 0 run clear @s minecraft:enchanted_book{Poisonous_Breath:1b}

/execute if score @s[nbt={Inventory:[{id:"minecraft:enchanted_book",tag:{Poisonous_Breath:1b}}]},nbt={cardinal_components:{"apoli:powers":{Powers:[{Type:"rimuru:give_poisonous_breath"}]}}}] rimuru_fpob matches 1 run clear @s minecraft:enchanted_book{Poisonous_Breath:1b}
/execute if score @s[nbt={Inventory:[{id:"minecraft:enchanted_book",tag:{body_armor:1b}}]}] rimuru_fba matches 0 run clear @s minecraft:enchanted_book{body_armor:1b}

/execute if score @s[nbt={Inventory:[{id:"minecraft:enchanted_book",tag:{body_armor:1b}}]},nbt={cardinal_components:{"apoli:powers":{Powers:[{Type:"rimuru:give_body_armor_activate"}]}}}]] rimuru_fba matches 1 run clear @s minecraft:enchanted_book{body_armor:1b}
/execute if score @s[nbt={Inventory:[{id:"minecraft:enchanted_book",tag:{ultrasonic_waves:1b}}]}] rimuru_fuw matches 0 run clear @s minecraft:enchanted_book{ultrasonic_waves:1b}

/execute if score @s[nbt={Inventory:[{id:"minecraft:enchanted_book",tag:{ultrasonic_waves:1b}}]},nbt={cardinal_components:{"apoli:powers":{Powers:[{Type:"rimuru:give_ultrasonic_waves"}]}}}] rimuru_fuw matches 1 run clear @s minecraft:enchanted_book{ultrasonic_waves:1b}

actions.command: execute if entity @s[scores={book=1..}] run function rimuru:book/give
execute if entity @s[scores={spell_1=1..}] run function rimuru:book/b1
execute if entity @s[scores={spell_2=1..}] run function rimuru:book/b2
execute if entity @s[scores={spell_3=1..}] run function rimuru:book/b3
execute if entity @s[scores={spell_4=1..}] run function rimuru:book/b4

if_action.command: tellraw @a [{"selector":"@s"},{"text":" died of a heart attack"}]
tellraw @a [{"selector":"@s"},{"text":" died of a heart attack"}]
tellraw @a [{"selector":"@s"},{"text":" died in a plane crash"}]
tellraw @a [{"selector":"@s"},{"text":" died in a car crash"}]
